title: Not Tomorrow Ecommerce App
description: An online fashion hub featuring firebase authentication for admin product updates, seamless Google sign-in/out capabilities, product filtering, search function, and swift loading times, hosted on Netlify for effortless CI/CD.
tech: React.js, Firebase, React Query, Cloudinary, React-responsive-carousel, Vite, Deployed by Netlify

title: Document Scanner App
description: An innovative app uses text recognition to extract text from live video or images, making it easy to capture and digitize text for quick access anywhere, anytime.
